item.title: copy 2 clipboard with ease
item.author: Author
item.description: Chrome extension - A simple and quick way to copy title and url with ease in chrome browser.

item.title: Life.com text copy
item.author: Author
item.description: Facebook 許多人都有轉載一些文章，看到有些不錯的文章，會想保存到 Evernote 上，Evernote 提供了 Evernote Web Clipper - Chrome Web Store 及 Clearly - Chrome Web Store 可以方便使用直接把面頁的文章快
